title: Best Baller Bling, Top 100 Players Reactions, Rookie Patience vs. Hype and Records Most Likely to Fall
itunes:title: Best Baller Bling, Top 100 Players Reactions, Rookie Patience vs. Hype and Records Most Likely to Fall
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Nate Burleson, Peter Schrager and Kyle Brandt break down the biggest trends from Week 2 of the NFL preseason. The hosts discuss a range of game topics including which players showed off the best bling over the weekend. Later, the crew discusses which fanbases need to be patient with the development of their young stars and which hype trains are off the rails. Players discussed include Miami Dolphins quarterback Tua Tagovailoa and New York Jets quarterback Zach Wilson. Also in the episode, Kay, Nate, Peter and Kyle react to the latest Top 100 list of the best NFL players and look ahead to the 2021 season predicting which iconic records could be broken.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
